channel.title: PIP Data Updates
channel.description: This side contains the revisions of PIP data

item.title: PIP data update on June 22, 2022
item.dc:creator: PIP Technical Team
item.description: Changes in national accounts data in Syrian Arab Republic.

item.title: PIP data update on May 9, 2022
item.dc:creator: PIP Technical Team
item.description: This intermediate PIP update corrects several errors as documented in this post.

item.title: PIP data update on April 08, 2022
item.dc:creator: PIP Technical Team
item.description: The semi-annual update to PIP presents new global poverty estimates for 2018 and revises previously published estimates, as a result of newly available survey data (a large number of new country-years have been added) and several changes to the underlying data. Further details on the changes are available in [this document](https://documents.worldbank.org/en/publication/documents-reports/documentdetail/099422404082231105/idu02070690808ee7044720a1e6010de398e6a75).

item.title: PovcalNet What is New
item.dc:creator: PIP Technical Team
item.description: This page is a replica of the old "What is New" of the now deprecated PovcalNet system. The intention of this page it to keep institutional memory publicly available.
